title: Upscale. Ball Park Views. Urban Oasis
posting_body: ['Take advantage of a prime Downtown Detroit location and all the best the city has to offer!', 'Your new home comes fully equipped with an in-unit washer/dryer and some paid utilities in a historic Detroit building.', 'When you join our community, you join a pet-friendly environment with a dog park footsteps from your front door.', 'Make this spaciously-appointed, 2-bedroom/1-bath apartment your home, with interior features that include:', '• Ample closet space.', '• In-unit washer/dryer.', '• Stunning Comerica Park and Downtown Detroit Views.', '• Cable ready.', '• Contemporary kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and granite countertops.', '• Pet-friendly.', '• Controlled-access building.', 'Make Broderick Tower your final stop for the best home destination that downtown has to offer.', 'It would be a pleasure to have you as a resident with us.', 'To learn more and make our community your home, contact us today to schedule your exclusive tour!']
